title: Trump Congressional Ally Discloses Latest Six-Figure Bitcoin Purchase
contentSnippet: Brandon Gill has purchased up to $2.6 million in Bitcoin this year, according to House transaction reports.

title: Bitfury pivots to launch $1B tech fund after 14 years of mining Bitcoin
contentSnippet: Bitcoin miner Bitfury started up in 2011, but has now pivoted to tech investing and will pour $1 billion into ethical AI and crypto startups.

title: Bitcoin’s November average gains based on ‘skewed’ numbers: Analysts
contentSnippet: Bitcoin has gained on average in November, but that figure is “skewed” and market participants shouldn’t always rely on it, a crypto executive says.

title: Bitcoin recovery expected as liquidity conditions change, but US macro remains a threat
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s recent weakness reflects broader economic stress, but improving liquidity and investors’ positive outlook for 2026 could set the stage for a strong rebound.

title: Kraken Scores $800M Raise Backed by $200M Citadel Securities Investment
contentSnippet: The funding, which values Kraken at $20B, accelerates plans to integrate traditional markets with crypto infrastructure across multiple regions.

title: Crypto Exchange Kraken Raises $800 Million at a $20 Billion Valuation
contentSnippet: Kraken just raised $800 million, including $200 million from Ken Griffin’s Citadel Securities, ahead of a potential IPO.

title: 3 SOL data points suggest $130 was the bottom: Is it time for a return to range highs?
contentSnippet: Charts and onchain data suggest that SOL might have bottomed at $130. Should traders anticipate a rally back to $200?

title: Bitcoin Billionaire Arthur Hayes Blames Crypto Plunge on 'Contraction in Dollar Liquidity'
contentSnippet: Former BitMEX CEO Arthur Hayes thinks that Bitcoin could plummet to the low $80,000s before rising as high as $250,000 by year’s end.

title: 'Permissionless Assets’: Robinhood’s 3-Phase Tokenization Plan to Disrupt TradFi
contentSnippet: Robinhood is working on infrastructure developments, said Offchain Labs' A.J. Warner, including 24/7 trading, and leveraging technologies like Arbitrum Stylus for compatibility.

title: New Toku–PDAX partnership lets Filipino workers receive pay in stablecoins
contentSnippet: The integration links token-based payroll with regulated cash-out rails, giving Filipino workers a way to receive stablecoin wages and convert them instantly to pesos.

title: Marshall Islands launches universal basic income program using digital wallet
contentSnippet: The launch of the UBI program, utilizing a “digital sovereign bond,” occurred two months after the IMF warned against the island nation using an “untested” digital asset.

title: Hawk Tuah Girl Added to Solana Meme Coin Lawsuit—After She Cooperated With Law Firm
contentSnippet: After initially being left out, Haliey “Hawk Tuah” Welch has been named in a class action suit against the creators of the meme coin she promoted.

title: Man Who Went By 'Shrek' Pleads Guilty to Helping Steal $263 Million in Crypto
contentSnippet: Authorities say stolen money was spent on luxury goods and exotic cars.

title: Paxos debuts USDG0 to extend its regulated stablecoin across multiple blockchains
contentSnippet: The new omnichain token brings fully backed dollar liquidity to Hyperliquid, Plume and Aptos while keeping a single regulated supply across networks.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today

title: Bitcoin charts flag $75K bottom, but analysts predict 40% rally before 2025 ends
contentSnippet: Bitcoin whales are accelerating their purchasing despite BTC’s short-term bearish outlook. Meanwhile, Wall Street analysts expect BTC to hit new all-time highs before the end of 2025.

title: Bitcoin ATM Company Founder Charged in Alleged $10 Million Money Laundering Scheme
contentSnippet: Federal prosecutors in Chicago said the operator of a Bitcoin ATM network took in illicit funds and moved them through digital wallets.

title: Regulator clarifies US banks can handle gas fees using crypto holdings
contentSnippet: The OCC said authorized national banks could hold crypto under specific circumstances, citing examples under the recently passed GENIUS act.

title: Treasury Dept. Says Banks Can Keep Crypto On Their Balance Sheets in Certain Cases
contentSnippet: National banks can now officially hold crypto to pay for network gas fees and engage in other crypto-related experiments, the OCC said Tuesday.

title: Canada Approves Budget That Advances Policy for Stablecoins
contentSnippet: The Canadian government narrowly won favor in Parliament for its budget push that includes a new policy governing stablecoins.

title: Did El Salvador Really Just Buy $100 Million in Bitcoin?
contentSnippet: The IMF has insisted that past increases were internal transfers.

title: Chainlink's LINK Bounces 4% to Near $14 as Cryptos Rebound
contentSnippet: LINK could target $14.50 if momentum sustains, CoinDesk Research's analysis tool suggested.

title: Bitcoin Backwardation Returns, a Pattern That Often Marks Market Bottoms
contentSnippet: Futures prices for BTC are trading below spot prices, signaling "extreme fear," which can sometimes be read as a contrarian buy signal.

title: Sen. Warren Keeps Pressure on Trump Crypto Ties as Market Structure Bill Negotiated
contentSnippet: Senator Elizabeth Warren is maintaining political heat on President Trump's World Liberty Financial business interests in a letter to the Treasury and DOJ.

title: Google Releases Its Most Powerful AI Model, Gemini 3—Here's What You Need to Know
contentSnippet: Google's Gemini 3 Pro outperforms previous models across reasoning and multimodal benchmarks. It's available on AI Studio, but not the consumer Gemini app.

title: Cloudflare Outage Sends Shockwaves Through Crypto, Renewing Push for DePIN
contentSnippet: Some in the crypto world have called for DePIN to be more widely adopted to combat internet outage issues.

title: Bitcoin Gains Tuesday as Traditional Markets Slump in Rare Occurrence of Crypto Outperformance
contentSnippet: After plunging below $90,000 overnight, BTC has regained the $93,000 level in U.S. morning action.

title: U.S. Regulator OCC Clarifies How Banks Can Handle Network 'Gas Fees'
contentSnippet: The U.S. Office of the Comptroller of the Currency explained to the national banks it oversees how they can hold crypto for paying gas fees.

title: Société Générale’s SG-FORGE Issues First Tokenized Bond in U.S.
contentSnippet: The bond uses Broadridge Financial Solutions' tokenization technology and runs on the Canton Network, a privacy-enabled blockchain infrastructure.
